title: Are there any other ways to deal with scripters other than reports?
body: Had a game with someone on my team who was clearly scripting, sent a report but is there anything else i can do? For example, record some of this persons game play and submit it in a ticket? As much as i like free lp, scripting is low. A quick look at this persons op.gg and their most played champs are xerath, cass and vayne.... Def sus....

replies.body: Submitting a ticket does nothing. I have submitted tickets before and they say to just use the "instant" feedback system.
Yeh it seems to be the trend for riot responses.....

Scripting bans are done in waves, so they aren't instant punishments. Support also won't tell you about any action taken on someone else's account (privacy policy and all that) and post game reporting is the best method, so yes, you will get a generic "thanks for your report, keep using post game reporting" type response. There isn't any other info they can give you.
Making a video record of things like scripting, and subsequently submitting a ticket to support with the footage, is probably the best thing you can do, outside of using the post-game report option.
